/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and man-made structure. The sun shines brightly in the sky, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
